project.title: roller madness
project.desc: In a physics-driven 3-D game, take control of a fireball. Collect all the artifacts on the level without jumping off the platform and avoid colliding into the ice balls. Progress through various levels to finish the game.

project.title: Aim Down Range
project.desc: The player takes control of a machine in a first-person shooter. The objective is to kill as many enemy targets as possible in a given time frame without hurting your friendly targets.

project.title: Bootcamp
project.desc: The player runs through an obstacle course in an fps environment and takes out all enemy targets in the way to reach the finish line. The objective is to finish the obstacle course as fast as possible without missing a single enemy target.
